      • validateFiles

        public static void validateFiles(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String[]... values)
        Validates the presence of various files from a root folder path Files are presented as an array of an array of file patterns as regex patterns
        Parameters:
        path - the root folder that holds the files as subfolders
        values - One or more string arrays each containing a list of file patterns

      • findFileForId

                                               java.lang.String filePattern)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Finds a file for a folder and file name pattern
        Parameters:
        path - the root folder
        filePattern - the file name with wild cards as a regex pattern
        Returns:
        Path as a Path object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be found or is invalid

                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a list of file paths for a file pattern with a root folder
        Parameters:
        path - The root folder that contains the files
        filePattern - a regex pattern for a file
        Returns:
        List of Paths
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the files cannot be found or are invalid
